menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh fruit and vegetables. A product for active and healthy people. It is a brand new product with an optimum price and high quality!

menu.title: The 'Lenten' menu
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products at all, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein through tofu and imported veggie steaks.

menu.title: The 'Premium' menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also the quality execution of the dishes. Red fish, seafood and fruit - a restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!
